summary: The Geriatrics Workforce Improvement Act (S. 2699) aims to reauthorize and fund education and training programs related to geriatrics. Specifically, it proposes amending the Public Health Service Act to appropriate $48,245,000 annually from 2026 to 2030 for these programs. The bill was introduced in the Senate by Ms. Collins and Mr. Kaine and referred to the Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions Committee.
